doc.title: Newsnight gets in a tangle over tyrants with Jeremy Paxman transcript | Media Monkey
doc.author: Monkey
doc.description: Media Monkey: The text of the presenter's interview with Silvio Berlusconi contained a bit of a howler

main.p: Jeremy Paxman's probing interview with Silvio Berlusconi may have garnered plenty of headlines, but Newsnight had a narrow escape after a bungle in the emailed transcript of the exchanges sent under embargo to journalists. In the broadcast interview, Berlusconi said that comic and activist Beppe Grillo "has many things in common with Robespierre, Stalin and Pol Pot, so he is not someone to be taken lightly." However, in the transcript sent out to press it said he "has many things in common with Robespierre, Stalin and Hitler". Cue an "urgent correction" email from what Monkey assumes was a frantic Newsnight PR team. Perhaps whoever transcribed the interview had the Nazi dictator on their minds after Prince Charles reportedly compared Vladimir Putin with Hitler. Still, as the old news adage goes 'never wrong for long'.
